name: TOUCH SELECTIONS
description: TOUCH SELECTIONS combines two classic games, PEG SOLITAIRE and AVOIDER, in a single download. In PEG SOLITAIRE, you are presented with a series of puzzles that will test your skills. Players must move their pegs around the game board, "jumping" other pegs to remove as many as possible. Your goal in AVOIDER is to travel through the galaxy without taking any damage by enemy ships. Use the Wii U™ GamePad touch screen to navigate, and then post your high score on Miiverse™ for all to see. How high of a score will you get?
